Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan will be facing Zimbabwe in the 24th game of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup, Australia, 2022 at Perth Stadium on 27th October 2022 at 04:30 PM IST.
Pakistan is currently ranked fifth on the points table, while Zimbabwe is ranked fourth.
The pitch at Perth Stadium is balanced with an average 1st innings score of 156 runs. The team batting first has won 65% of matches here.
Pacers have taken 80% of the total wickets at this venue, making them a good pick for fantasy teams.
In the 17 matches played between Pakistan and Zimbabwe, Pakistan has a better record.
Pakistan bowlers have earned the most fantasy points for their team, while all-rounders have earned the most for Zimbabwe.
